Description.p: A code from SnomedCT UK that describes the material in a specimen for anlaysis, such as mid-stream urine, sputum, venous blood, etc.
A code from SNOMED CT (UK), may be accompanied by additional SnomedCT(UK) qualifying codes.

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Specimen Material Type subset with subset original id 1381000000136.
